name: PONG + Tic Tac Toe
description:
The idea is simple: The fusion of Pong and Tic Tac Toe into one unique game.

The game is multiplayer. The left paddle (W and S keys) in Pong is the "X" player in Tic Tac Toe and the right one (UP and DOWN Arrow ) is the "O" player.

When a player scores in Pong he can do a move in Tic Tac Toe.
